price: Enti (Soalh) danee ne ho firii wͻn ho kaa sε: “Menkorͻfoͻ, mebͻͻ mo me Wura Nyankopͻn Asεm no ho dawuro kyerεε mo, na metuu mo fo, nanso moampε afotuo no”.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَقَدۡ أَبۡلَغۡتُكُمۡ رِسَالَةَ رَبِّي وَنَصَحۡتُ لَكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُحِبُّونَ ٱلنَّٰصِحِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fatawallā ʿanhum waqāla yāqawmi laqad ablaghtukum risālata rabbī wanaṣaḥtu lakum walākin lā tuḥibbūna al-nāṣiḥīna
